issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement castVARCHAR(float_type) functions in Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7308](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7308). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support following function signature in Gandiva:
FunctionSignature{name =castVARCHAR, return type =Utf8, param types =[float_type, Int(64, true)]}
